topic.title: Row and Column Numbering in MODFLOW and PHAST

para.text: PHAST and MODFLOW differ in how rows and layers are numbered as shown in

. PHAST uses a standard right-hand coordinate system with the 1, 1, 1 layer, row, column in the closest lower left corner of the grid. MODFLOW is oriented with 1, 1, 1 in the furthest upper left corner.
